elements.text: You're at the first session with a new therapist, and you hesitate to disclose your PD diagnosis. You are stressed as you anticipate their reaction and understanding about PD. Ultimately, you decide to tell them and leave the appointment feeling...

elements.name: New Therapist_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
